name: AP_CLAIM_IF_DX_HAC_USAGE
description: Indicates if the diagnosis code and present on admission (POA) value combination were used in grouper processing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_HAC_USAGE
columns.description: Indicates if the diagnosis code and present on admission (POA) value combination were used in grouper processing.

columns.name: DX_HAC_USAGE_1
columns.description: Whether or not the first diagnosis code and POA value combination were used in grouper processing.

columns.name: DX_HAC_USAGE_4

columns.name: DX_HAC_USAGE_5
columns.description: Whether or not the fifth diagnosis code and POA value combination were used in grouper processing.
